official_title: A Prospective Randomized Comparison of Colonoscopy Adenoma Detection Rate With a Disposable Cap (ENDOCUFF VISION®) (Endocuff) Versus a Permanently Mounted Balloon (G-EYE®)
inclusion_criteria:
1. Screening and surveillance population for Adenoma and CRC.
2. The patient must understand and sign a written informed consent for the procedure.
Healthy volunteers allowed
